description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to install a new escape stair, amendments to apartments layouts, amendments to parking layouts and alterations to the fenestration, in pursuant to planning permission reference 216854VAR dated 16/11/2022 for 'Minor Material Amendment (S.73) to vary condition 2 (approved plans) pursuant to planning permission reference 192342FUL dated 24/06/2020 (as amended by 216135NMA, dated 04/11/2021 and 221549NMA, dated 29/04/2022) for 'Redevelopment of the site to provide a residential building with vehicular access from Greenford Road and associated vehicle parking (following demolition of petrol filling station and ancillary buildings on site)'. Amendments include the installation of a basement, creation of residential accommodation at ground floor, alterations to vehicular access and installation of roof plant'
